title: Leaverbuster Bug
body: I recently got a leaver buster for 5 games with a 20 minute warning. I have currently sat through the 20 minute warning 12 times. 7 times it didn't que me in to a game when the timer ended, so I had to sit through the timer again. And the rest of the times someone else dodges and it kicks me out of que meaning i have to sit through the timer again. I understand that I made a mistake by leaving a couple of games, but this is torture.

replies.body:
Hey Vi Bot,

This could be due to a client issue if you're unable to join matches. Can you try [**Repairing Your Client**](http://www.wrenchmen.org/resources/knowledgebase/1?view=article) and see if that resolves your issue?
